verifications.expected_state: Settings app opens and displays the main settings menu.
verifications.actual_state: Screen with 0 UI elements; Screen size: [1080, 1920]
issues_found: The Settings app did not open as expected after tapping the icon.
There was no transition to the Settings app screen, indicating a broken navigation flow.
suggestions: Investigate the tapping action for the Settings app icon to ensure it correctly triggers the app to open.
Check for any potential issues in the app's launch intent that may prevent the Settings app from opening.
Ensure that the UI elements are properly loaded and available for interaction.

verifications.expected_state: User can see 'Network & Internet' option on the screen.
verifications.actual_state: Screen with 0 UI elements; Screen size: [1080, 1920]
issues_found: The 'Network & Internet' option is not visible on the screen after the scroll action.
suggestions: Investigate the visibility of the 'Network & Internet' option and ensure it is present in the scrollable area.
Check if the scrolling mechanism is functioning properly and if the content is loading as expected.

verifications.actual_state: Screen with 0 UI elements; Screen size: [1080, 1920]
issues_found: The 'Network & Internet' settings page did not open after tapping the option.
suggestions: Investigate the tap action as it appears not to be functioning correctly.
Check for any modal dialogs or error messages that may indicate why the settings page did not open.
Ensure that the 'Network & Internet' option is present and selectable in the UI.

verifications.expected_state: 'WiFi' option is visible on the screen.
verifications.actual_state: Screen with 0 UI elements; Screen size: [1080, 1920]
issues_found: 'WiFi' option is not visible on the screen after scrolling.
suggestions: Investigate why the 'WiFi' option is not displayed after the scrolling action. Ensure that the UI elements are correctly populated and check for any conditions that might hide this option.

verifications.actual_state: Screen with 0 UI elements; Screen size: [1080, 1920]
issues_found: The WiFi settings page did not open after tapping the 'WiFi' option, indicating a functional issue.
suggestions: Investigate the tap action for the 'WiFi' option to ensure it triggers the expected navigation.
Check if the 'WiFi' page has been properly implemented and is reachable from the previous screen.

verifications.actual_state: Screen with 0 UI elements; Screen size: [1080, 1920]
issues_found: WiFi toggle did not reflect the change to 'On' position after action was taken.
suggestions: Investigate the toggle switch functionality to ensure it correctly reflects the on/off state.
Implement UI elements to show the current status of the WiFi toggle for better user feedback.

verifications.actual_state: Screen with 0 UI elements; Screen size: [1080, 1920]
issues_found: The WiFi toggle switch did not change to the 'Off' position as expected.
suggestions: Investigate the WiFi toggle functionality to ensure it correctly updates the UI state.
Check for any potential issues with the mock environment that could prevent UI state changes from being reflected.
Consider adding visual feedback to indicate the WiFi toggle's state.

plan.description: Test WiFi settings by navigating to the settings menu, locating the WiFi option, and toggling WiFi on and off.

subgoals.description: Open the Settings app from the home screen.
subgoals.expected_outcome: Settings app opens and displays the main settings menu.
subgoals.verification_criteria: Verify that the Settings app is open and the main menu is displayed.

subgoals.description: Scroll down to find the 'Network & Internet' option.
subgoals.expected_outcome: User can see 'Network & Internet' option on the screen.
subgoals.verification_criteria: Verify that 'Network & Internet' option is visible.

subgoals.description: Tap on 'Network & Internet' to access network settings.
subgoals.verification_criteria: Verify that the 'Network & Internet' settings page is displayed.

subgoals.description: Find the 'WiFi' option within the 'Network & Internet' settings.
subgoals.expected_outcome: 'WiFi' option is visible on the screen.
subgoals.verification_criteria: Verify that the 'WiFi' option is visible.

subgoals.description: Tap on the 'WiFi' option to access WiFi settings.
subgoals.verification_criteria: Verify that the WiFi settings page is displayed.

subgoals.description: Toggle the WiFi switch to turn it on.
subgoals.verification_criteria: Verify that the WiFi toggle is in the 'On' position.

subgoals.description: Toggle the WiFi switch to turn it off.
subgoals.verification_criteria: Verify that the WiFi toggle is in the 'Off' position.

plan.success_criteria: WiFi settings are accessed successfully, and the toggle works as expected turning WiFi on and off.
